Package dao

Class Dao_question

java.lang.Object
dao.Dao_question
public class Dao_question
extends java.lang.Object
This Data Access Object class contains methods that work in conjunction with the Question class. It establishes a connection with the electionmachine DB and its methods allow for the performing of CRUD operations on said data through the utilization of attributes from the aforementioned class.
Version:
3.0
Author:
HAMK's Finest Date: April 14, 2021

  • Constructor Details

    • Dao_question

      public Dao_question​(java.lang.String url, java.lang.String user, java.lang.String pass)
      String based parameterized constructor for Dao_question class.
      Parameters:
      url - takes String arg of url for to connecto to.
      user - takes String arg of username for user to access DB.
      pass - takes String arg of password for user to access DB.

  • Method Details

    • getConnection

      public boolean getConnection()
      Method attempts to establish a DB connection based on supplied attributes if one does not exist already. Method requires JDBC driver.
      Returns:
      boolean value representing connection success or failure.
      Throws:
      java.sql.SQLException - error

    • readNewQuestions

      public java.util.ArrayList<Question> readNewQuestions()
      CRUD method operates in conjunction with the Question class. Creates list as instance of said class, then utilizes DB connection to read all questions from the new_questions table. ResultSet is then iterated over, and values are packed into attributes of Question class that match the columns as specified in Question class notes.
      Returns:
      ArrayList of Question instance with attributes packed with values from database.
      Throws:
      java.sql.SQLException - error

    • insertQuestion

      public void insertQuestion​(java.lang.String q)
      CRUD method utilizes established connection conn to DB in order to run insert statement, inserting new question value into new_questions DB.
      Parameters:
      q - takes String q of question to insert into DB.
      Throws:
      java.sql.SQLException - error

    • insertNewQuestion

      public void insertNewQuestion​(Question question)
      CRUD method utilizes Question class to insert new question value into the new_questions DB. Attribute is loaded with new questions, and used to pass value to DB with conn connection.
      Parameters:
      question - takes String question set to Question object's question attribute.
      Throws:
      java.sql.SQLException - error

    • deleteNewQuestion

      public void deleteNewQuestion​(java.lang.String question)
      CRUD method deletes question (and entire row) from new_questions table based on provided NEW_QUESTION_ID. Uses conn connection established through constructor.
      Parameters:
      question - takes String of question marking NEW_QUESTION_ID number.
      Throws:
      java.sql.SQLException - error

    • readAllQuestion

      public java.util.ArrayList<Question> readAllQuestion()
      CRUD method utilizes Question class instance as list and constructor established connection as conn to read entire questions table. Results are placed in ResultSet and through iterator and attributes of instance of Question class which match columns of the table and hold individual rows per column.
      Returns:
      list object (instance of Question class) with attributes loaded from matching columns of questions table.
      Throws:
      java.sql.SQLException - exception.

    • updateQuestion

      public java.util.ArrayList<Question> updateQuestion​(Question q)
      CRUD method utilizes Question class instance as list and constructor established connection as conn to update question(s) in questions table based on provided QUESTION_ID.
      Parameters:
      q - takes Question instance loaded with Id attribute for Id where question should be changed.
      Returns:
      list object (instance of Question class) with attributes loaded from matching columns of entire updated questions table.
      Throws:
      java.sql.SQLException - exception.

    • deleteQuestion

      public java.util.ArrayList<Question> deleteQuestion​(java.lang.String id)
      CRUD method utilizes Question class instance as list and constructor established connection as conn to delete question(s) from question table based on provided QUESTION_ID as id.
      Parameters:
      id - takes String id of question id where question is to be deleted.
      Returns:
      list object (instance of Question class) with attributes loaded from matching columns of entire updated questions table.
      Throws:
      java.sql.SQLException - exception.

    • readQuestion

      public Question readQuestion​(java.lang.String id)
      CRUD method utilizes established connection of conn and Question class instance to select all rows of questions table mathing provided QUESTION_IDs. Values are returned with ResultSet, which is iterated over allowing values to be packed in Question instance's attributes.
      Parameters:
      id - takes String of id(s) matching QUESTION_ID for questions to return
      Returns:
      Question class instance whose attributes have been loaded with required questions and ids based on provided QUESTION_ID args.
      Throws:
      java.sql.SQLException - exception.
